page.title: 05ANNUAL EVENTS AT CAERWYS ctd
page.content:
{AGRICULTURAL SHOW.- } Held in May in the field below the school.It is mainly a show of horses, sheep,pigs,etc., but there are other attractions like the beer tent, various side shows and sport. One of the highlights is the running- race from Denbigh to Caerwys.
{PANCAKE RACE.-} Run on Shrove Tuesday from the Piccadilly, down the High Street to the Square. {CHRISTMAS ACTIVITIES.- } These include singing carols around the Christmas tree on the Town Square, a carol service by the school children in Church and a Christmas concert at school. Other events are the {CLAY PIGEON {SHOOT,HORSE SHOW}and {SHEEP DOG {TRIALS. }
